title: Student Record Management
body:
The Student Record Management System is a console-based C++ application crafted to efficiently manage student records through seamless file I/O operations. This project empowers users with a range of functionalities, including adding new student records, deleting entries, displaying a comprehensive list of students, searching for specific students, and updating student information.
 The system leverages the simplicity of a user-friendly console interface, making data entry and retrieval an intuitive process. The modular system architecture showcases strong problem-solving skills, allowing for easy maintenance and scalability.

title: Weather Integrated Task Scheduler
body:
This project is a console based C++ application designed to enhance users time management and organization. It allows users to schedule events, manage tasks efficiently, and view weather inofrmation of their location, all within a secure and user-friendly console interface.
 The application provides a secure login system, allowing users to customize thier profiles, change passwords and plan their activites intelligently based on current weather conditions. 
 This application leverages the OpenWeatherMap API to deliver real-time weather data for any location. Users can view current conditions including temperature, and humidity.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe Game
body: This project is a simple implementation of the classic Tic-Tac-Toe game. It allows two players to take turns making moves and checks for a winner or a tie after each move. The game board is displayed using HTML and styled with CSS, while the logic and interactivity are handled with JavaScript.
